name: Wooden Cow
text: Vanilla

name: Pegasus
text: Vanilla

name: Minotaur
text: Vanilla

name: Titan
text: Vanilla

name: Zeus
text: When Revealed: Lower the power of each card in your opponent's hand by 1.

name: Ares
text: When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each enemy card here.

name: Medusa
text: When ANY other card is played here, lower that card's power by 1.

name: Cyclops
text: When Revealed: Discard your other cards here, gain +2 power for each discarded.

name: Poseidon
text: When Revealed: Move away an enemy card here with the lowest power.

name: Artemis
text: When Revealed: Gain +5 power if there is exactly one enemy card here.

name: Hera
text: When Revealed: Give cards in your hand +1 power.

name: Demeter
text: When Revealed: Both players draw a card.

name: Hades
text: When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each card in your discard pile.

name: Hercules
text: When Revealed: Doubles its power if it's the strongest card here.

name: Dionysus
text: When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each of your other cards here.

name: Hermes
text: When Revealed: Moves to another location.

name: Hydra
text: Add two copies to your hand when this card is discarded.

name: Ship of Theseus
text: When Revealed: Add a copy with +1 power to your hand.

name: Sword of Damocles
text: End of Turn: Loses 1 power if not winning this location.

name: Midas
text: When Revealed: Set ALL cards here to 3 power.

name: Aphrodite
text: When Revealed: Lower the power of each enemy card here by 1.

name: Athena
text: Gain +1 power when you play another card here.

name: Apollo
text: When Revealed: Gain +1 mana next turn.

name: Hephaestus
text: When Revealed: Lower the cost of 2 cards in your hand by 1.

name: Persephone
text: When Revealed: Discard the lowest power card in your hand.

name: Prometheus
text: When Revealed: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.

name: Pandora
text: When Revealed: If no ally cards are here, lower this card's power by 5.

name: Icarus
text: End of Turn: Gains +1 power, but is discarded when its power is greater than 7.

name: Iris
text: End of Turn: Give your cards at each other location +1 power if they have unique powers.

name: Nyx
text: When Revealed: Discards your other cards here, add their power to this card.

name: Altas
text: End of Turn: Loses 1 power if your side of this location is full.

name: Daedalus
text: When Revealed: Add a Wooden Cow to each other location.

name: Helios
text: End of Turn: Discard this.

name: Mnemosyne
text: When Revealed: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand.
